      • ColumnHeader

        public ColumnHeader(java.lang.String fieldName,
                    java.lang.String label,
                    DataFormats formatter,
                    SummaryType summaryType,
                    java.lang.String subTotalTrigger)
        Make a column header for report details
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Field name
        label - Text for the column header
        formatter - Method for formatting the data
        summaryType - Whether/what kind of summary to display at end of column
        subTotalTrigger - - name of the field that, upon value change, triggers the display of a subtotal
